sentences.en: At present, the electrostatic suspended gyroscope ( ESG ) is the most precise inertia instrument in the world.
sentences.cn: 静电陀螺仪是目前世界上最高精度的惯性器件.

sentences.en: Discovery is delivering a new astronaut sleeping quarters, an ammonia tank and a gyroscope for the space station.
sentences.cn: “发现”号将为空间站送去一个新的宇航员睡觉舱，一个氨水箱和一个回转仪。

sentences.en: Drag onto the page to add a gyro, gyroscope , or gyrocompass.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页后，可以添加回转仪、 陀螺仪或回转罗盘。

sentences.en: Drag onto the page to add a gyro, gyroscope, or gyrocompass.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页后,可以添加回转仪 、 陀螺仪或回转罗盘.

sentences.en: Electrostatic suspended gyroscope ( ESG ) is recognized as the most accurate gyroscope nowadays.
sentences.cn: 目前,静电陀螺被公认为是测量精度最高的陀螺仪,但是其的造价昂贵.

sentences.en: Hold the spinning Bicycle Wheel Gyroscope with its axis horizontal.
sentences.cn: 手上拿著车轮回旋仪并保持它的转轴水平.

sentences.en: In the process of simulation, by adjusting the precision of the gyroscope, accelerometer and video camera, we can get a series of results.
sentences.cn: 在仿真过程中，调整陀螺仪、加速度计和摄像机这三者的精度，可以得到一系列结果。

sentences.en: North - finding method is an important research of gyroscope north finder.
sentences.cn: 寻北方法是陀螺寻北仪的重要研究对象.

sentences.en: Represents a gyro, gyroscope, or gyrocompass.
sentences.cn: 表示回转仪 、 陀螺仪或回转罗盘.

sentences.en: Silicon gyroscope has low precision and serious non - linear errors.
sentences.cn: 微硅陀螺精度不高,存在严重的非线性误差.

sentences.en: Strap - down flexible gyroscope north seeker provides direction and position , navigation data for the military vehicle.
sentences.cn: 捷联式挠性陀螺寻北仪能为军车提供基准定向和导航数据.

sentences.en: The compensating method for MEMS gyroscope random drift error is discussed.
sentences.cn: 从工程实用的角度出发,探讨了MEMS陀螺仪随机漂移误差的有效补偿方法.

sentences.en: The compensation of Dead Band is an important problem in designing a closed - loop Fiber Optic Gyroscope.
sentences.cn: 克服死区是 闭环 光纤陀螺设计中需要考虑的重要问题.

sentences.en: The equipment and environment of fiber - optic gyroscope ( FOG ) zero - drift experiment are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了 光纤陀螺 零漂实验的设备环境,硬件和软件的构成及数据采集过程.

sentences.en: The gyroscope compass makes the vessels keep on the fixed course voluntarily.
sentences.cn: 陀螺罗盘自动使船只保持在预定的航线上.

sentences.en: The gyroscope in tank is used to stabilize the aim system of the gun.
sentences.cn: 坦克中的陀螺仪用于稳定火炮的瞄准系统。

sentences.en: The law of conservation of angular momentum may be demonstrated with a gyroscope.
sentences.cn: 角动量守恒定律,可以用回转器来演示.

sentences.en: The paper presents the dither feedback which exploits magnetoelectric dither pick - up ( MEDP ) technology in ring laser gyroscope.
sentences.cn: 经分析 指出,磁电拾振技术应用在机抖激光陀螺抖动反馈方案中,其工作原理属于速度型传感器,直接反映抖动偏频量.

sentences.en: The scheme improves stability of gyroscope driving well.
sentences.cn: 由此可见,本方案使陀螺仪驱动性能得到了极大提高.

sentences.en: Used in combination with GPS, an accelerometer, a compass and the gyroscope can be used for in indoor navigation with floor accuracy.
sentences.cn: 与全球定位系统、加速度计、陀螺仪和指南针结合使用，可用于具有地面精度的室内导航。

words.tran_cn: 回转仪的，[航][水运] 陀螺的

trans.tran_en: a wheel that spins inside a frame and is used for keeping ships and aircraft steady. It can also be a child’s toy.
